meanings.definition: Make the best or most effective use of (a situation, opportunity, or resource).
meanings.sent1: She optimized her study time by creating a schedule and sticking to it.
meanings.sent2: The company optimized their website to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: He optimized his lunch break by eating quickly and then taking a power nap.
meanings.sent4: The athlete optimized her training routine to reach peak performance for the competition.
meanings.sent5: By optimizing his morning routine, he was able to get to work on time every day.

meanings.definition: Modify (a system) to make it as fully functional or effective as possible.
meanings.sent1: The IT team optimized the network to improve internet speed in the office.
meanings.sent2: The engineers optimized the software to reduce loading times.
meanings.sent3: He optimized his gaming setup by adding extra cooling fans for maximum performance.
meanings.sent4: The chef optimized the recipe by adjusting the cooking time and temperature.
meanings.sent5: By optimizing the car engine, he was able to increase fuel efficiency and horsepower.
